alert.note: Alert for Coastal Hillsborough; Coastal Manatee; Coastal Pasco; Coastal Sarasota; Hardee; Inland Hillsborough; Inland Manatee; Inland Pasco; Inland Sarasota; Pinellas; Polk (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 29 at 6:19PM EDT by NWS Tampa Bay
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Pasco, northwestern Hardee, Manatee, Pinellas, Hillsborough, southwestern Polk and northwestern Sarasota Counties through 715 PM EDT... At 619 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Largo to 14 miles west of Anna Maria to 80 miles southwest of Saint Armands Key. Movement was northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Tampa, Clearwater, Lakeland, Largo, Sarasota, Bradenton, Pinellas Park, Plant City, Temple Terrace, Bartow, Seminole, New Port Richey, Zephyrhills, Palmetto, Dade City, Wauchula, Fort Desoto Park, Holiday, Fish Hawk, and Saint Petersburg. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM EDT for central and west central Florida.
